cs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[17], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[7], immediateIndexed
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_uav_typed_texture2d (float,float,float,float) u0
dcl_input vThreadIDInGroup.xy
dcl_input vThreadID.xy
dcl_temps 6
dcl_tgsm_structured g0, 4, 64
dcl_thread_group 8, 8, 1

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw


// WATCH_DOGS2 Camera Position adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-screen-space-reflections-cs --fix-wd2-unproject --fix-wd2-camera-pos -i --only-autofixed 75393c6f28e7b1a3-cs.txt

mul r2.w, r2.x, r2.y
mul r4.x, r2.w, cb0[9].x
mul r4.y, r2.w, cb0[10].x
mul r4.z, r2.w, cb0[11].x
mul r4.w, r2.w, cb0[12].x
dp4 r5.x, r4.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r5.y, r4.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r5.z, r4.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
add r3.xyz, cb0[174].xyz, r5.xyz

mov r0.xy, vThreadID.xyxx
mov r0.zw, l(0,0,0,0)
ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.x, r0.xyzw, t0.xyzw
mov r0.y, l(1.000000)
dp2 r0.z, r0.xyxx, cb0[15].zwzz
dp2 r0.x, r0.xyxx, cb0[16].zwzz
div r0.x, -r0.z, r0.x
imad r0.y, vThreadIDInGroup.y, l(8), vThreadIDInGroup.x
store_structured g0.x, r0.y, l(0), r0.x
sync_g_t
and r0.zw, vThreadIDInGroup.xxxy, l(0, 0, 1, 1)
ieq r0.zw, r0.zzzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0)
and r0.z, r0.w, r0.z
if_nz r0.z
  iadd r0.yzw, r0.yyyy, l(0, 1, 8, 9)
  ld_structured r0.y, r0.y, l(0), g0.xxxx
  ld_structured r0.z, r0.z, l(0), g0.xxxx
  ld_structured r0.w, r0.w, l(0), g0.xxxx
  min r0.y, r0.z, r0.y
  min r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
  min r0.x, r0.w, r0.x
  mad r0.x, r0.x, cb1[0].x, cb1[0].y
  div r0.x, cb1[0].z, r0.x
  add r0.x, r0.x, cb1[0].w
  mul r0.x, r0.x, cb1[6].z
  max r0.x, r0.x, cb1[6].x
  min r0.x, r0.x, cb1[6].y
  ushr r1.xyzw, vThreadID.xyyy, l(1, 1, 1, 1)
  store_uav_typed u0.xyzw, r1.xyzw, r0.xxxx
endif 
ret 
// Approximately 31 instruction slots used
